name: 圖形辨認
description: 這個世界很多事物都由各種不同的圖樣(pattern)所組成，例如每個人雖然長相皆不相同，但是每個人的臉都具備相似的圖樣。成功辨識特定主題的圖樣，是在資訊科技中加入”智慧”時不可缺少的要素。本課程的主要目的在透過講授、實作、討論的過程，讓同學能夠學習圖形辨識各面向的知識，包含了特徵擷取、辨識模型、監督式與非監督式學習等理論知識，並學習針對特定主題實作圖形辨識之技能，以達到理論與實務兼顧的目標。
goals: 學習圖形辨認的基本理論
瞭解圖形辨認的原理與運作
熟悉圖形辨認在實務上的應用
培養圖形辨認的實作能力
syllabus:
This course will cover basic material in pattern recognition as well as some less traditional topics, depending on time constraints and  
general interest.  
  
Tentative Outline  
• Introduction to pattern recognition  
• Supervised learning:  
1\. Bayes classifier  
2\. Discriminant functions, application to classification of normal mixtures  
3\. Parameter estimation: Maximum Likelihood; Bayes; recursive Bayes  
4\. Nonparametric methods: Parzen windows; kn-nearest neighbor  
5\. Nearest neighbor classifier, relation to Bayes  
6\. Dimensionality reduction  
7\. Linear discriminant functions  
8\. Perceptron and multi-layer perceptrons  
9. Support vector machines  
• Unsupervised learning:  
1\. Clustering: criteria; methods (k-means); cluster validity  
2\. Maximum likelihood estimation of mixture parameters (unsupervised)  
3\. Bayesian estimation
